abstract: Twitter, the microblogging service which reportedly rebuffed a $500 million takeover offer from Facebook recently, is returning to the venture capital trough, TechCrunch reported.
lead_paragraph: Twitter, the microblogging service which reportedly rebuffed a $500 million takeover offer from Facebook recently, is returning to the venture capital trough, TechCrunch reported.

headline.main: Twitter Said to Seek More Funding
